alert.note: Alert for Cambria (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CAMBRIA COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 407 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Johnstown. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Johnstown, Westmont, Geistown, Southmont, Vinco, Dale, East Conemaugh, South Fork, St. Michael, Daisytown, Ehrenfeld, Elim, Lorain, Brownstown, Johnstown Flood National Memorial Historic Site and John Murtha Johnstown-Cambria County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
